description.p: Download Alpha Anywhere using the link provided in your Community Edition sign-up email.

note.p: *[extlink:Request a free Community Edition license@https://www.alphasoftware.com/build-apps-for-free-community-edition-download]* if you do not have one.

description.p: When the download completes, run the installer.
Windows User Account Control may ask you if you want to run the installer. Click "Yes" to continue with the installation.
Run the installer to completion. This typically takes 5 minutes.
Alpha Anywhere may require a restart to complete the installation. If prompted after installation completes, restart your computer.
Alpha Anywhere requires a license number to run. You will be prompted to enter your license the first time you run the software.

Locate your license number. If you do not have a license, you can *[extlink:request a free Community Edition license@https://www.alphasoftware.com/build-apps-for-free-community-edition-download]*. If you purchased an Alpha Anywhere subscription and cannot locate your license, contact custserv@alphasoftware.com.
Enter your Alpha Anywhere license number and click OK.
Great! Now that Alpha Anywhere is installed and registered, we can start building an app.
